resp = client.search(
    index="shirts",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "filter": [
                {
                    "term": {
                        "color": "red"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "term": {
                        "brand": "gucci"
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "models": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "model"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
